product_name: Leki Snowflake Trekking Pole Snow Baskets - Pair
long_description: The Leki Snowflake baskets for trekking poles feature a large, 3.75-in. diameter to provide flotation in packed snow or deep powder. Screw threads makes it fast and easy to change back to the smaller baskets that come with your trekking poles. Sold as a pair.
short_description: The Leki Snowflake baskets for trekking poles feature a large, 3.75-in. diameter to provide flotation in packed snow or deep powder.
